Class ContextVar

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.spark.geom.dataRep.ContextVar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Numberable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CallsiteContextVar, IntervalContextVar

    public abstract class ContextVar
extends java.lang.Object
implements Numberable
    The root class for representing context sensitive pointer/object in explicit form.
